room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: My family and I played the Mob Boss Room just last week and we had a blast! Everything about the room was great: the clues, the theme, the decor, and the story! The staff was also very welcoming and just hands down the best; thank you Jason! Definitely will come back to play again!!

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: The rooms are challenging and the themes are great. I have done the Mob Boss and Crazy Professor. Can't wait to do the Hostage situation. If you like puzzles and teamwork, these rooms are for you.

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: So much fun! We had never done an escape room before and really enjoyed it.

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: The staff was friendly. We did the easy hostage escape one and want to come back for a harder room if we have time.

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Awesome!!! We loved it. Great fun in the Mob Boss room. Clever and well thought out puzzles. Telling all my friends about it. Would recommend to complete strangers, LOL. Family fun and adventure at it's best!!!

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: We did Mob Boss for our very first time with our 14 and 17 year old and it was a great time! I highly recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Mob Boss was fairly tough, definitely not made for beginners but not as hard as the professor.

room_title: Escape room "Mob Boss" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Awesome.  We did the Mob Boss room and it was so much fun. We had for people and it was a challenge. The store front was bright and clean and the room itself was very well decorated.  The people running everything were just so nice and helpful.  Very helpful since we needed it!  The puzzles were clever and well thought out. Can't say enough about this place.  If you want to do something different in Vegas this is it! Family fun and adventure at its best!
